description: Learn how to create effective Service prompt pages for restaurants, salons, and service-based businesses. Get more reviews with our proven approach.

best_practices.title: Keep Questions Specific
best_practices.description: Ask about specific aspects of your service rather than general satisfaction.

best_practices.title: Use Positive Language
best_practices.description: Frame questions positively to encourage detailed, constructive feedback.

best_practices.title: Include Multiple Touchpoints
best_practices.description: Cover different aspects of the customer journey from booking to follow-up.

best_practices.title: Make It Personal
best_practices.description: Use your business name and personalize questions to your specific services.
